about_the_game:
With this DLC, your Twitch viewers can use Twitch emotes to change their skin.
This excludes emotes from extensions like BTTV/FFZ.

Usage:
!emote [emoteName]

Example:
!emote Kappa

This DLC mostly exists as a way to support the developer.
Several customisation options will be added during the development of the game.
Of course, the perks this DLC offers will remain exclusive to this DLC.
detailed_description:
With this DLC, your Twitch viewers can use Twitch emotes to change their skin.
This excludes emotes from extensions like BTTV/FFZ.

Usage:
!emote [emoteName]

Example:
!emote Kappa

This DLC mostly exists as a way to support the developer.
Several customisation options will be added during the development of the game.
Of course, the perks this DLC offers will remain exclusive to this DLC.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Twitch emote skins

subs.option_text: Live Maze - Support the dev DLC - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Let your Twitch viewers use Twitch emotes as their player model
